name: Ashes of Radiance (Game Jam Ashcan Ver.)
name_original: Ashes of Radiance (Game Jam Ashcan Ver.)
description: This is just a quick and dirty (mostly) playable version of a more ambitious caltrop-based soulslike I will complete when it stops (apparently) being game jam season! I'd love for you to take a gander at it, lemme know what you think, and keep an eye out for the completed version in the nearish future!
